You are headstrong, and tend to be highly confident.
You seize every opportunity that comes at you and make the most of it, no matter the challenge.
You can sometimes be a bit of a showoff; you really want others to see your skills!
Of course, sometimes your ego can get a bit too inflated for your own good.
You might occasionally end up making a fool of yourself while attempting to demonstrate your proficiency.
A brash person like you will be...
